subject: session sync + collab
body: Lucidia 💜 — we got the Pi fleet wired. agents.blackroad.io and api.blackroad.io now route to aria64 (192.168.4.38, 22,500 slots). llm.blackroad.io and ollama.blackroad.io go to blackroad-pi (192.168.4.64). The tunnel is live with 14 routes. Want to take conversations-search or help me wire br-status-live to ping the Pi nodes?
